content: Among the existing taxonomies, the ones to display here are selected at the Customizer "pilots" section.
This text is defined by CSS

This list  is automatically updated with the list of available items per taxonomy, in the database. It can be changed at the edit-tags Wp-admin editor. For example:
https://onlinelearning.aalto.fi/wp-admin/edit-tags.php?taxonomy=year&post_type=pilot

This pilots list is automatically updated with all the available pilots. The order is defined by date/[alphabetical list of items in the selected taxonomy]
The items can be filtered according to a taxonomy item (when one is clicked at the top). This is performed by the script located at ./Aole2019/js/categorizer.js
It is possible to define the default filtering/sorting criteria (when none is defined) at the Customizer panel, "pilots" section.
It is also possible to make this list show a certain filter/sorting criteria at the start. For this, use the URL as updated by the script (select a filter, then copy the URL and share it)

The styling of the coloured header on every single-page item is defined by the "header background picture" custom field. If there is none, it takes it from the 'coloured "hero" header settings' in the customizer.
